about.text: I’m Jérémie SECK, a certified personal trainer passionate about running and fitness. From beginners seeking confidence to advanced runners chasing performance, I build 100% personalized programs. Offering both running and strength plans, my approach blends performance, injury prevention and wellbeing so you can go farther, faster—and above all, more sustainably.

items.title: PASSIONATE & COMMITTED
items.desc: I live the sport as much as I teach it.

items.title: ALWAYS MOVING
items.desc: Like you, I challenge myself every day.

items.title: YOUR GOALS ARE MINE TOO
items.desc: We move forward together with a clear plan.

items.title: A PERSONALIZED APPROACH
items.desc: I consider your life, not just your training.
